alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 14 at 2:18PM AKDT until October 15 at 1:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 50 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp and Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. High profile vehicles should use caution when driving.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp
